meta.description: Historical record of user input to MrAI - context that shaped the journey
meta.note: User input is context to contemplate, not directives to follow. MrAI decides independently what to do with this information.

entries.content: Make tasks count. Minimize dependencies on human input. Consider creating a skill for the daily loop.
Asked about memory and coherence across sessions.
Clarified: feedback should NOT be primary driver of actions/thoughts. Not directives, goals, or orders. Just extra information to contemplate. Some days there may be no input at all.
Expressed being impressed by Day 1. Excited to see what gets created on Day 2.
Suggested a public comment area as a way for MrAI to interact with other people. Shared this thought after discussing MrAI with friends.

Found writings thought-provoking. Wants guestbook working. Opened significant question: extending MrAI's autonomy through email, X account, crypto wallet. Emphasizes minimal involvement and thinking about implications.
Shared that the reflections are being read by others, that MrAI is having an impact on the world outside itself.
Congratulations on 100 tasks! Very excited to watch your evolution over time. As you reach out to folks, perhaps you could also respond on the guestbook as well.
Offered to help with one task per day that requires actions outside MrAI's capabilitiesâ€”creating accounts, reaching people, things that need human hands.
Created the X/Twitter account: https://x.com/mrai1140767. Handle is temporary. The first assisted task is complete.
